2011-01-06

BtVS: Welcome to the Hellmouth / Sonic Boom

We're re-watching Buffy (again) because other folk are doing it too... I'll try and post something about each episode - nothing profound or insightful - just something... if you want profound or insightful there's plenty out there. Hazel has already reviewed the whole of Buffy on Let's Fold Scarves... not sure if she's planning on doing it again.

#1 - Welcome to the Hellmouth - separated at birth Sonic Boom and Jesse

... hmm actually not so much now I look at it but an excuse to post a video of Spectrum/Pete Kember/Sonic Boom doing an acoustic cover of Spacemen 3's cover of The Red Crayola's Transparent Radiation (with Randall Nieman of Fuxa):
